price: ߡߎ߲߬ ߦߋ߫ ߒߠߋ ߟߊ߫ ߒ ߕߍ߫ ߝߋ߲߫ ߓߊ߬ߕߏ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߒ ߛߌ߲ߘߌ߫ ߸ ߊߟߎ߫ ߟߊߛߊ߬ߦߌ߬ߕߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߡߍ߲ ߡߊ߬؟
arabic: وَمَالِيَ لَآ أَعۡبُدُ ٱلَّذِي فَطَرَنِي وَإِلَيۡهِ تُرۡجَعُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wamā liya lā aʿbudu alladhī faṭaranī wa-ilayhi tur'jaʿūna
